headline: 3 Reasons Investors Love Progressive (PGR)
summary: Over the past six months, Progressive’s stock price fell to $249.03. Shareholders have lost 10.6% of their capital, which is disappointing considering the S&P 500 has climbed by 8.6%. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
